noun.description: An object used to indicate a position, place, or route.
examples: they erected a granite marker at the crash site
the most portable marker of class privilege, the wearing of natural fibers

noun.description: A felt-tip pen with a broad tip.
(chiefly in soccer) a player who is assigned to mark a particular opponent.
A person who records the score in a game, especially in snooker or billiards.

examples: Phyllis owed a marker in the neighborhood of $100,000
